title: Skill Seeker Ingest Run Config v1
description: Describes how to execute the Skill Seeker ingest pipeline (mode, async, enhancement, outputs).

mova_version.description: MOVA core version targeted by this schema.

run_id.description: Identifier of this ingest run configuration.

source_config_ref.description: Reference to a source config (e.g. config_id).

mode.description: Execution mode for the ingest pipeline.

execution_flags.description: Execution toggles for scraping and concurrency.

workers.description: Number of workers for async/parallel modes.

skip_scrape.description: Reuse existing scraped data instead of fetching.

resume_checkpoint.description: Resume from saved checkpoint when available.

enhance_local.description: Use local enhancement (e.g. Claude Code Max).

api_provider.description: API provider used for enhancement (e.g. anthropic).

output_naming.description: Naming and path conventions for output artifacts.

env_requirements.description: Environment credential requirements for this run.

needs_ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Whether an Anthropic API key is required.

needs_GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Whether a GitHub token is required for this run.
